education.institution: College of Commerce, Arts and Science, Patna

education.board: Central Board of Secondary Education, Patna

responsibilities: Developed a sleek, Netflix-inspired user interface with a modern, dark-themed color palette, enhancing user experience and visual appeal.
Implemented responsive design and intuitive navigation features, ensuring seamless user interaction across various devices.
Utilized tech stacks: HTML, CSS, JavaScript, ReactJs, Tailwind.

projects.name: Image Caption Generator
projects.description: Developed a neural network model to generate captions for images using CNN for images and LSTM for text.
details: Used the Flickr8k dataset consisting of 8k images with 5 captions per image and the Flickr30k dataset.
Implemented VGG16 for image feature extraction and CNN-LSTM network to predict captions based on extracted image features and previous words.
Achieved a BLEU-1 score of 0.544 and a BLEU-2 score of 0.319 on the Flickr8k dataset.

projects.name: CodeSync
projects.description: Designed a real-time code editor, where we can practice coding with friends.
details: Used socket.io and codemirror module to simulate the code editor.

achievements.title: Intel OneApi Hackathon Finalist
achievements.description: Finalist in the Hackathon based on supervised machine learning
